trans-unit.source: This dialog is normally used by <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.PolicyActivity"></xref> to edit rule sets.
However, if you want to use a rule set outside of this activity (for example, edit a rule set for use outside of a workflow), you can use this dialog to perform the editing of the rule set.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Design.RuleSetDialog"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that this <xref href="System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> is executed against.
Typically it is the workflow (as used by <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.PolicyActivity"></xref>), but it can be any valid activity.
The initial <xref href="System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> to be displayed.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Design.RuleSetDialog"></xref> class.
The type of the object that this condition is executed against.
Normally it is the workflow, but can be any valid type.
An optional <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider"></xref> implementation that is used to determine what `Types` are available in the condition.
If one is not specified, only types in the assembly specified by activityType and any assemblies it references are available.
The initial <xref href="System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> to be displayed.
Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Design.RuleSetDialog"></xref>.
`true` to release both managed and unmanaged resources; `false` to release only unmanaged resources.
Processes a command key.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference that represents the Win32 message to process.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
`true` if the keystroke was processed and accessed by the control; `false` to allow further processing.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> as confirmed by the dialog box user.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> as confirmed by the dialog box user.
